\begin{eqnarray} \label{eqn:RC}
\chi^{Vir}_{(2j+2)q-1,1}&=& \f{1}{\eta(q)} \sum_{n \in Z} \left[ q^{(2pqn+2(j+1)pq-p-q)^2/4pq} - q^{(2pqn+2(j+1)pq-p+q)^2/4pq} \right] \nonumber \\
&&=\f{1}{\eta(q)} \sum_{m \in Z} \left[ q^{(2pqm-p-q)^2/4pq} - q^{(2pqm-p+q)^2/4pq} \right]
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\theta_{\lambda,k}&=& \sum_{n \in Z} q^{(2kn+\lambda)/4k} \\
\partial \theta_{\lambda,k}&=&  \sum_{n \in Z} (2kn+\lambda) q^{(2kn+\lambda)/4k} \\
\partial^2 \theta_{\lambda,k}&=&  \sum_{n \in Z} (2kn+\lambda)^2 q^{(2kn+\lambda)/4k} \\
\

\begin{eqnarray}
F_1 &=& 1 \nonumber \\
F_2&=& \ln z \nonumber\\
F_3 &=& \ln(1-z) \\
F_4 &=& \ln^2 z  -2 \ln z \ln(1-z)\nonumber\\
F_5 &=& \ln^2(1-z) -2 \ln z  \ln(1-z) \nonumber\\
F_6 &=& \ln(1-z) \ln z + 2~ dilog(z) \nonumber
\
